job_description:
UI/UX Designer

Position: UI/UX Designer

We are looking for a talented and detail-oriented UI/UX Designer with strong Figma skills to join our product team. You will play a key role in designing intuitive, user-centric digital experiences for our products. From wireframes to high-fidelity prototypes, you’ll own the end-to-end design process, collaborating closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design of user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.
  • Create wireframes, user flows, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI designs using Figma.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Product, Engineering, Marketing) to understand user needs and business goals.
  • Conduct user research, usability testing, and gather feedback to inform design decisions.
  • Maintain and evolve our design system to ensure consistency across all products.
  • Translate complex ideas into clean, intuitive, and accessible user experiences.
  • Stay up to date with design trends, tools, and best practices.

Requirements:

  • 2+ years of experience in UI/UX or product design.
  • Strong proficiency in Figma (Auto Layout, Variants, Prototyping, Design Systems).
  • Solid understanding of UX principles, user-centered design, and responsive design.
  • Portfolio showcasing design work across web and/or mobile platforms.
  • Experience working with Agile or cross-functional product teams.
  • Ability to present and communicate design decisions clearly.
  • Familiarity with user research methods and usability testing is a plus.

Bonus:

  • Experience with tools like FigJam, Adobe XD, or motion tools (e.g., Principle, After Effects).
  • Front end development skills will be a bonus (HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, React or Vue).

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at Designer@kottsoftware.com
summary: Seeking a UI/UX Designer with 2+ years of experience to create intuitive digital experiences. Responsibilities include wireframing, prototyping, and user research using Figma.
